ARABIC: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have no idea whether evil is intended for those on the earth, or whether their Lord intends them to be rightly guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We do not know if this means ill for the dwellers of the earth, or their Lord wishes guidance for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and that “we do not know whether evil is intended for those on the earth, or whether their Lord intends to direct them to the Right Way”;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We do not know whether by this arrangement God intends benefit and guidance for the people of the earth or only evil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘And we do not know whether harm is intended for those on the earth, or whether their Lord intends goodness for them.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: `And we know not whether evil is intended for those on the earth, or whether their Lord intends for them guidance.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that we know not whether evil is meant for those who are on earth or whether their Lord means to bring them good:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And so we know not whether evil is intended for those in the earth, or whether their Lord intends for them rectitude.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And we know not whether harm is boded unto all who are in the earth, or whether their Lord intendeth guidance for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: we cannot tell if this bodes evil to those who dwell on earth or whether their Lord intends to guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And we know not whether evil is boded for those who are on the earth, or whether their Lord intendeth for them a right direction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We do not know whether ill is intended for those who are on the earth, or whether their Lord intends good for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And we understand not whether ill is intended to those on earth, or whether their Lord (really) intends to guide them to right conduct.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And we know not whether evil is intended for those on earth, or whether their Lord intends for them a Right Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And so we do not know whether evil is intended for those on earth, or whether their Lord intends to guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We do not know whether ill is intended for those on earth, or if their Lord intends goodness for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:10] And we do not know, by not being able to eavesdrop by stealth, whether ill is intended for those who are in the earth, or whether their Lord intends for them good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And we know not whether) in preventing us from listening (harm is boded unto all who are in the earth, or whether their Lord intendeth guidance for them) or whether their Lord intends guidance, goodness and the correct course for them; it is also said that this means: we do not know whether evil is intended for the people of the earth by the advent of Muhammad (pbuh) such that if they do not believe in him they will be destroyed or it is good, guidance and the correct course that their Lord intends for them if they believe in 700 him.
